arn:aws:ec2:${Region}::snapshot/${SnapshotId}
arn:aws:lightsail:${Region}:${Account}:InstanceSnapshot/${Id}
arn:aws:lightsail:${Region}:${Account}:DiskSnapshot/${Id}
arn:aws:lightsail:${Region}:${Account}:ExportSnapshotRecord/${Id}
arn:aws:lightsail:${Region}:${Account}:RelationalDatabaseSnapshot/${Id}
arn:aws:rds:${Region}:${Account}:cluster-snapshot:${ClusterSnapshotName}
arn:aws:rds:${Region}:${Account}:snapshot:${SnapshotName}
arn:aws:redshift:${Region}:${Account}:snapshot:${ClusterName}/${SnapshotName}
arn:aws:redshift:${Region}:${Account}:snapshotcopygrant:${SnapshotCopyGrantName}
arn:aws:redshift:${Region}:${Account}:snapshotschedule:${ParameterGroupName}
arn:aws:s3:::${BucketName}
arn:aws:s3:::${BucketName}/${ObjectName}
arn:aws:lightsail:${Region}:${Account}:Disk/${Id}
arn:aws:dynamodb:${Region}:${Account}:table/${TableName}
arn:aws:backup::${Account}:backup-vault:${BackupVaultName}
arn:aws:dynamodb:${Region}:${Account}:table/${TableName}/backup/${BackupName}
arn:aws:fsx:${Region}:${Account}:backup/*
arn:aws:ecr:${Region}:${Account}:repository/${RepositoryName}
arn:aws:secretsmanager:${Region}:${Account}:secret:${SecretId}
arn:aws:neptune-db:${Region}:${Account}:${RelativeId}/database
arn:aws:ssm:${Region}:${Account}:parameter/${FullyQualifiedParameterName}
arn:aws:ssm:${Region}:${Account}:document/${DocumentName}
arn:aws:ssm:${Region}:${Account}:session/${SessionId}
arn:aws:ssm:${Region}:${Account}:patchbaseline/${PatchBaselineIdResourceId}
arn:aws:ec2:${Region}::image/${ImageId}
arn:aws:ec2:${Region}:${Account}:traffic-mirror-session/${TrafficMirrorSessionId}
arn:aws:ec2:${Region}:${Account}:traffic-mirror-target/${TrafficMirrorTargetId}
arn:aws:ec2:${Region}:${Account}:traffic-mirror-filter/${TrafficMirrorFilterId}
arn:aws:ec2:${Region}:${Account}:traffic-mirror-filter-rule/${TrafficMirrorFilterRuleId}
